metadata.name: John Napier's Portrait & 17 Years
metadata.description:
Portrait of John Napier, the founder of logarithms, produced from the 17-year and 117-page Logarithm Thesis written by a mathematician. This piece was created by the collaboration of a Mathematician and an Artist.

The study includes the content of the 117-page thesis. The first buyer of the product will have the digital document of the 117-page thesis.

1/1
